Baltimore bridge collapse: Cargo ship lost power and issued mayday before hitting Baltimore’s Francis Scott Key Bridge bridge https://www.nzherald.co.nz/world/baltimore-bridge-collapse-cargo-ship-lost-power-and-issued-mayday-before-hitting-baltimores-francis-scott-key-bridge-bridge/ L342G2XGMBGG3HISOBSGTSFBKE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/world/baltimore-bridge-collapse-cargo-ship-lost-power-and-issued-mayday-before-hitting-baltimores-francis-scott-key-bridge-bridge/ L342G2XGMBGG3HISOBSGTSFBKE/ A construction crew and several vehicles were plunged into dangerously cold waters. Tue, 26 Mar 2024 19:51:11 +0000 Parts of the Francis Scott Key Bridge remain after a container ship collided with a support in Baltimore. The major bridge snapped and collapsed and several vehicles fell into the river below. Rescuers were searching for multiple people in the water. Photo / Getty
